{RHelp Topic{W: Aroch, Arochs{x

Arochs are a nomadic, barbarian people that dwell within the great
desert known as The Burning Sands. They are a vicious people and are
considered the toughest race in all of Akrios, suiting their name to a tee
for they are a people rough and hard like rocks. Their most recognizable
trait being their two extra arms, four total, and they have learned how to
use these extra appendages to their fullest extent in combat. Be it dualing
four weapons or just using their bare hands combined with their unique
martial arts, they can overwhelm a single opponent quite quickly, even two
or three opponents rarely makes these people break a sweat. Arochs are
desert raiders, attacking any caravan that dares to enter The Burning Sands
and often raiding small towns and villages that reside on the outskirts of
the great desert. Many people consider The Burning Sands a death trap, and
it is, rarely does a man enter the desert and is ever seen again. Arochs
have thick tough skin that is as good if not better than leather armor, most
likely from being out in the sun all of their lives. They rarely wear armor,
seeing has how it is hot and nonflexible. It is rare indeed to see any armor
made for the four armed desert people. Arochs are dark skined, with brown or
black hair, and brown eyes. They are usually quite muscular and range in
height about 5'11" to 6'7". They are not very well mannered, and are quick
to anger. They are vicious and have little mercy if any at all. There are
few outside their race that can tolerate them and be tolerated back. They
are also a very religious people and quite wise in the ways of life.
